vi: This is for you guys too.

en: Kamu semua datang ada sebab… Sekejap.
vi: You're all here for a reason… No, wait.

en: Zaim keluar ke suatu tempat, aku tak tahu.
vi: Zaim sneaked out somewhere, I don't know.

en: Ada sebab aku panggil kamu semua ke sini hari ini.
vi: I called you guys here today for a reason.

en: Sebabnya, tempat duduk kamu di dewan peperiksaan nanti
vi: The reason is, that your seats in the examination hall

en: Kamu semua akan jadi Cermin aku.
vi: You guys will become my Mirrors.

en: Tak apa kalau tak nak. Kami faham.
vi: It's okay if you don't feel like it. We understand that.

en: Kamu boleh pergi sebelum kita teruskan.
vi: You can leave before we continue.

en: - Dari mana kau dapat ini? - Apa itu?
vi: -Where did you get this? -What is that?
The answer sheets for the SBP Trial!
-Let me see! -I want to see that!
-Botol, go sit down now. -I want to see it!

en: Mana kami dapat, itu tak penting.
vi: It's not important where we got it.

en: Tidak, kami takkan buat salinan untuk seluruh tingkatan.
vi: And no, we won't make copies for our batchmates.

en: Betul, sebab kita akan gunakan Peperiksaan SBP ini
vi: Right, because we will use SBP Trial

en: sebagai latihan penuh untuk SPM nanti.
vi: as our full rehearsal for SPM.
You're all guaranteed to get straight As.
Of course. I'm a girl, right?

en: Hei, Hayati bukan kekasih? Atau kau dah lupa?
vi: Hey, isn't Yati your girl? Or have you forgotten?

en: - Aku nak telefon ibu aku. - Kirim salam.
vi: -I want to call my mom. -Send my regards.
Is it about Aaidaa and Aizat?

en: Tak adalah. Sudah bertahun-tahun aku tertanya-tanya,
vi: Well, I've just been wondering for years,

en: Sebab dia kacak, pandai main ragbi.
vi: Well, he's handsome, he's a star rugby player.

en: Kau kawan baik dia, mesti kau tahu.
vi: You're his best friend, you should know.

en: Sebab aku kawan baik dia, aku memang kenal dia.
vi: Because I'm his best friend, I know him well enough.
He's sort of an idiot sometimes.

en: Sebab itulah aku tanya kenapa ramai orang suka dia.
vi: That's why I'm asking why he has so many admirers.

en: tapi tak kenal siapa dia sebenarnya.
vi: but they don't know who he really is.

en: Sudah lama kamu tak melawat Hayati.
vi: You haven't visited Yati for a while.

en: Perhatian kepada semua pelajar tingkatan lima.
Sila berkumpul di asrama masing-masing sekarang.
vi: Please gather at your respective dorms right now.
The warden and I are waiting.

en: Saya ada sebab tersendiri untuk saya percaya…
vi: I have my own reasons to believe
that my office was broken into

en: dan ada beberapa barang berharga yang dicuri.
vi: and some valuable items were stolen.
To be more specific, copies were made.

en: Kepada sesiapa yang faham maksud saya,
vi: To anyone who understands what I mean,

en: Di STIA, kita tak pernah bersekongkol dengan pencuri.
vi: In STIA, we never conspire with thieves.

1 DAY UNTIL SBP TRIAL
 Hey, wait.

en: Aku dah cakap semua ini gila.
vi: I told you, this is crazy.

en: Sekarang ini, macam mana? Seluruh sekolah mencarinya.
vi: What do we do now? The whole school is looking for this.

Jat!
 They don't have proof, Aaidaa.

Okay.
 I got the answer sheets!

en: Hei, kau ada buat salinan aku punya?
vi: Hey, did you make copies of mine?
Why do you believe those SSG kids?

en: Ini kertas jawapan untuk Percubaan PMR.
vi: These are the answer sheets for the PMR Trial.
PMR is long over, you idiot.
We don't have Integrated Life Skills for SPM.
So that's why there were only eight subjects.

en: Jaja pula tak bercakap dengan aku.
vi: And Jaja is not talking to me.
We have to burn the answer sheets.
Write everything down and burn them.

en: Cuma ada Walkman ini, Tuan Awang.
vi: There's just this Walkman, Sir Awang.

en: Kamu berdua buat apa di sini?
vi: What are you two doing here?

en: Aaidaa tolong ajar kami semua di sini.

vi: She's the reason I improved a lot.
We know a lot about you.

en: Saya pelik macam mana Mohd Aizat bin Abdullah
vi: How could Mohd Aizat bin Abdullah

en: prestasinya meningkat secara mendadak kebelakangan ini?
Ada apa-apa rahsia yang awak nak beritahu saya?
vi: Is there anything you want to share with me?

en: Tuan boleh beritahu saya apa yang kita cari.
vi: You could tell me what we're searching for.
It will make our lives so much easier.

en: Saya mencari di merata tempat untuk sesuatu yang saya tak tahu.
vi: I've been searching high and low for something I don't even know.

en: Awak akan tahu apabila jumpa nanti.
vi: You'll know when you find it.

en: Tak apalah kalau tuan kata begitu.
vi: Well, that's all right if you say so.
Aaidaa, give me back the answer sheets.

en: Kau yang yakin tadi, sepatutnya kau yang simpan.
vi: You were so confident just now, they should be with you.

en: Aku tertekan. Aku tiada masa nak bergurau.
vi: I'm stressed out. I have no time to be joking.
I'm looking for the answer sheets, Aaidaa.

en: Kau tak nampak warden selongkar tadi?
vi: Didn't you see the warden searching for it?

en: Kalau ia ada, tentu dia dah jumpa.
vi: Of course he would've found it if they were here.
Why did you accuse me like that?

en: Kenapa? Sebab aku cemburukan kau dan Aizat?
vi: Why? Because I'm jealous of you and Aizat?

en: Macam mana kau tahu aku ada di sini?
vi: How do you know I'd be here?

en: Aku tak tahu aku nak buat apa, Botol.
vi: I don't know what I have to do, Botol.
Do you have to do anything?
It's not the end of the world.

en: Kau tak faham betapa pentingnya untuk aku lulus SPM.
vi: You don't understand how important it is for me to score in SPM.

en: Aku tak suka kesan SPM pada tingkatan kita.
vi: I don't like what SPM has done to our batch.
Some are fighting and not talking to each other.

en: Mereka dah lupa? Ini tahun terakhir kita di sini.
vi: Did they forget? This will be our last year here.

en: Lima tahun terbaik dalam hidup aku.
vi: The best five years of my life.

en: Takkan nak biar ia berlalu saja?
vi: I don't want the moment to pass by just like that.
that we won't be here for much longer?

en: Kita takkan lalui semua ini lagi.
vi: We won't experience anything like this anymore.
Everyone will go their own way.

en: Aku lebih takutkan semua itu daripada SPM.
vi: I'm more afraid of all that than SPM.

en: Aku harap seluruh tingkatan boleh dengar kata-kata kau tadi.
vi: I hope the whole batch can hear what you just said.
You guys are Mirrors. You have to be responsible.

en: Hei, aku jadi Cermin untuk tolong kamu semua.
vi: Hey, I became a Mirror to help you guys.

en: Tempat duduk kamu berdua dekat dengan Aaidaa.

vi: You guys are safe no matter what.
As if you're doing it for our batch.

en: Siapa kau untuk persoalkan semangat tingkatan kita?
vi: Who are you to question my loyalty to our batch?

en: Perhatian kepada semua pelajar tingkatan lima.
Diminta berkumpul di padang sekolah sekarang.
vi: Please gather at the school field now.
but will be very much appreciated.
Where do you think you're going?

en: Macam mana kau boleh pegang pula?
vi: How did these end up with you?
were mixed with mine the other day.

en: Aku sedang fikir tentang nak dapatkan kembali RM300.
vi: I was thinking about my refund of RM300.

en: Aku terus tukar baju dan curi-curi keluar ke SSG.
vi: I immediately changed and sneaked out to SSG.

en: Aku cari semula budak yang jual ini kepada aku.
vi: I went to find the kid who sold these to me.

en: Selepas itu, kau dapat RM300 semula?
vi: Did you get your RM300 back?
Well, how was it? Getting caned?
Okay but was it worth it?

en: Biar saya yang selia hari ini.
Cikgu, saya tak boleh tahan lagi.
vi: Sir, I can't hold it anymore.

en: Berhenti menjawab. Letakkan pensel di atas meja.
vi:
Stop writing.
 Put your pencils down.

en: Kenapa dengan kau di dewan tadi?
vi: What's wrong with you back there?

en: Kakak aku sendiri pun tak tanya.
Macam mana dia nak tanya kalau dia pun tak tahu?
vi: How can she ask you if she doesn't know?

en: Dia duduk di depan. Kau duduk di belakang.
vi: She sits right in front. You sit at the back.

en: Dia tak nampak apa yang kau buat.
vi: She can't see anything you do.

en: Sebagai kakak aku, dia kena tanya tentang aku.
vi: As my sister, she must ask about me.

en: - Tak tahu nak ketuk? - Maaf, tuan.
Kedudukan untuk Percubaan SBP dah keluar, tuan.
vi: The ranking for the SBP Trial is in, sir.

en: Sudah lebih sepuluh tahun kita tak capai kedudukan pertama untuk SBP.
vi: We haven't achieved number one for SBP in more than ten years.

en: Jaja, sampai bila kau nak mogok dengan aku?
vi: Ja, when will this silent treatment end?

en: kalau aku dah kecilkan hati kau.
masa aku setuju nak buat ini,
vi: that when I agreed to do this,

en: kau nombor satu dalam fikiran aku.
vi: you were number one in my mind.

en: rasa tak seronok sebab kita bergaduh.
vi: it doesn't feel right because we're fighting.

en: kau orang paling penting dalam hidup aku.
vi: that you're the most important person in my life.

en: kalau aku tak pandai menunjukkannya selama ini.
vi: if I haven't been good at showing it.

en: Cuba kalau aku tak baling batu pada kau.
vi: What if I never threw a rock at you?

en: Aku buat latihan ragbi hari itu.
vi: I went to rugby training the other day.
Okay, let's cancel the Project Anchor.

en: Tapi kau kena beritahu seluruh tingkatan.
vi: But you have to tell our whole batch.

en: Tapi aku tak kisah jatuh tempoh hari.
vi: But I'm fine falling the other day.

en: Kalau itu tak terjadi, kita takkan jadi kawan.
vi: If it didn't happen, we wouldn't be friends.
And I think that's a great loss.

en: Kalau tak percaya, tanyalah seluruh tingkatan.
vi: If you don't, just ask our batchmates.

en: Semua akan cakap perkara yang sama.
vi: Everyone will say the same thing.

en: Akhirnya aku rasa macam sebahagian daripada tingkatan lima.
vi: I finally feel like a part of the batch in Form 5.

en: Itu salah kau sebab kau selalu menyorok daripada kami.
vi: That's your fault because you've always been hiding from us.

en: Kalau aku menyorok, kau yang jumpa aku.
vi: If I've been hiding, you were the one who found me.
I want to tell you something, but…

en: aku tak tahu macam mana nak beritahu.
vi: I don't know how to tell you this.

en: Okey, aku berterus terang dengan kau.
vi: Okay, I'll just be honest with you.

en: Kita berdua. Maksud aku, aku dan kau…
vi: Both of us, I mean you and me,
after all this time, I feel that…
I like hanging out with you.

en: aku rasa kita kena kurangkan lepak bersama.
vi: I think we shouldn't hang out together as much.

en: Entahlah. Dia masih tak bercakap dengan aku.
vi: I don't know. She's still not talking to me.

en: Tak apa, aku faham dan hormatinya.
vi: I understand and I respect that.
You really love her, don't you?
Of course, I only have her in my life.

en: Kau langsung tak penting dalam hidup aku berbanding Jaja.
vi: You're not important at all in my life compared to Jaja.
You just have to be patient.
No, I overheard Botol the other day.

ANSWER SHEET, CONFIDENTIAL
 ANSWER SHEET
 This.
Do you know who did this?

en: Jaja, tunggu! Kau buat apa di situ?
vi: Jaja, wait! What are you doing there?

en: Daa, aku nampak kau tenang tanpa sebarang masalah.
vi: Daa, you seem calm without any problems.

en: Tapi setiap manusia ada masalah, bukan?
Tapi kalau kau boleh terus buat begini sehingga SPM…
vi: But if you can continue like this until SPM…

en: ♪ Oh, sang mulia dan beban dunia ♪
♪ Oh, sang mulia dan beban dunia ♪
